name: Not Enough Time (Marron121, lluispalerm, LauraQwerty)
description:
After a zombie outbreak takes place in a small city, a woman and her family must try to survive the onslaught.

Each night morale and defenses will drop. Is there any point in trying to surive?

Choose your priorities and remember: delay the inevitable.

                       

Game made for the Ludum Dare 50, with the theme Delay the Inevitable.

CONTROLS

  • Left Arrow/A: Move left
  • Right Arrow/D: Move right
  • Space: Interact.
